opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Commissioner of Internal Revenue v. Banks

opinion:
542 U.S. 964

COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE
v.
BANKS.

No. 03-907.

Supreme Court of United States.

September 28, 2004.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 541 U. S. 958.] Motion of respondents for divided argument granted. Motion of respondents for additional time for oral argument denied. Motion of respondent Banks to allow James R. Carty to argue pro hac vice granted. Motion of the Acting Solicitor General to allow David B. Salmons to argue pro hac vice granted.
